smart_goals.description: Reduce daily carbohydrate intake to 45% of total caloric intake by increasing vegetable consumption at meals and decreasing sugary snacks. Achieve this within 4 weeks.
Engage in at least 150 minutes of moderate-intensity aerobic activity or 75 minutes of vigorous-intensity aerobic activity per week for 3 consecutive weeks.
Monitor and record daily pre-meal and post-meal blood glucose levels using a glucometer for the next month to improve awareness and identification of trends.
Drink at least 8 cups (64 oz) of water daily to maintain proper hydration levels and support kidney function. Track progress using a water intake log for 3 weeks.
Improve sleep quality by establishing a consistent bedtime routine and aiming for 7 hours of sleep per night. Assess progress through self-reporting and sleep logs over the next 2 months.
